actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to increase the amount allowable as deduction for retirement savings.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase the income tax deduction for contributions to retirement savings accounts to $2,300 ($2,700 for certain married individuals) for taxable years beginning in 1978 with yearly cost-of-living increases for taxable years beginning after 1978.

titles.title: A bill to increase the amount allowable as deduction for retirement savings.
